chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: What's up guys, you are back to the Sigma web development course.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: I am really very happy that you all have given so much love to this course.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Like this course with high energy.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Because for a Sigma free course, you need to like the Sigma chats.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: In today's video, I will explain you the basic structure of a website.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Along with that, I will tell you a mobile trick

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: which will help you know how to preview your website on your phone.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: I have a request from you all that you all write in the comment section

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: whether you know HTML or not.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: That will help me structure this course better.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: In this video, I will tell you the impact of chat GPT.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Because there are a lot of talks going on about chat GPT these days.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: In the coming videos, I am going to give you all quizzes.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So understand this video very carefully and learn all the concepts.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Let's roll the intro.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So guys, I have come inside my computer screen.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: And now we will talk about how to create a lay of a website based on opening text, closing text, and structure.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So here I will create a folder named video3.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: New folder, video3.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: And in video3, I will open it by right-clicking and selecting open with code.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: And here you can see that my theme is blue.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: And a lot of people said that blue theme is not good.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now see, the theme is your own choice.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: If you want to change the color theme, you can change your color theme.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: I want to use the dark theme of Github, so I can use the dark theme of Github.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: It's your choice.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: To create a new file, I will put index.html here.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: We had already talked about it that if I write the title of the page here,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: and write the content here,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: and then using the link tag here,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: I can use Emmet here and link style.css.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: I am doing it so fast because we have already talked about it in the last video.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: And if I write script.js here,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: and if I write here, let's say, alert, hello.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So I will not tell you again and again that if I put a script tag here,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: just before the body,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: and then I put script.js here,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: and then I click here and open with browser,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: then this hello will come.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: And if I make the background of the body red here, it will turn red.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: I will not tell you all this,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: because I have already told you this.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now I will tell you that what does this structure mean?

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Why did I write it so big?

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: This is a doubt for a beginner that we can't write this title and content directly.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: What is the need to write so much?

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So I will tell you what is the need to write so much.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: I will reload it.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: See, the content that we had here came and it turned red here.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now here you saw that I needed to reload the page.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Many of you must have asked why did I need to reload?

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: When it already reloads live.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So I changed the CSS file.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: When I change the CSS file,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: at times we need to reload.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: If you are making changes in the HTML file,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: then you don't need to reload the changes in the HTML file.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now here what I will do is I will come back and explain to you.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: This is a basic structure of any HTML website.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: First of all, we write doc-type HTML.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Then we write HTML tag.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now see this is the opening tag of HTML tag.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: This is the closing tag.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: This is the opening tag of the body.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: This is the closing tag.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: This is the opening tag of the head.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: This is the closing tag.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: That is, whatever is inside it is the content of the head.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Whatever is inside HTML, what is it?

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: It is the content of HTML.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Accordingly, whatever is inside the title is the content of the title.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now you will say what is the content of meta?

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So meta is a self-closing tag.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: There are two types of tags in HTML.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: One is the self-closing tag.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: And one is the pair tag.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: What happens in the pair tag is that your opening tag is the closing tag.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So this is the basic structure of the HTML website.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now here you saw that the background has turned red.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Who is this background turning red?

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: This is happening because of CSS.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: If I remove CSS from here and tell CSS to move away quickly,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: what will I say to CSS?

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Move away quickly.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: And as soon as I tell CSS to move away quickly,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: it will have to move away from here.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: I will reload the page.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So you can see that it has moved here.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Similarly, I can also say to JavaScript,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: move away quickly.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now see, if I say from here, the alert will also stop.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So you see, if I reload now, the alert will also stop.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So the CSS and JavaScript I added to this HTML content,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: this is additionally CSS and JavaScript functionalities

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: we used to link it with this HTML page.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now I have already told you about the title tag.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: This page is used to set the title.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now the only purpose of this is that you see the title here.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: The search engines that are there,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: they also use it.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: That is, the search engines are Google.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: If you write here, Code with Harry HTML,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: then the HTML introduction of Code with Harry,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: HTML working, all these titles I have put on the page.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: You see here, HTML introduction is the title of the page.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So these titles of the page are used by search engines

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: and are parsed.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now if I change the page here,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: then the HTML title is working here.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now I will change the page again,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: you see here the HTML installation is done, its title.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So the titles keep changing.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Along with that, as I keep changing it,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: it will keep changing,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: as you can see.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So the title of HTML pages does not mean

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: just that you see this up here.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: It is also very useful in SEO.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: And they tell what is the content inside the page.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So they describe the content of the page.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Like I am getting to know what is HTML execution here.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: HTML execution means how HTML is being executed.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: I am being told about this page.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So changing the title of the page is a very good SEO practice.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So we will make a website from any framework,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: we will keep changing the title of the page.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now here is the head section.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: The metadata of the page is inside the head section.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Like the title is done,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: and which script do you want to link with,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: that is done.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Along with that, there are other meta tags,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: about which I will tell you later.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Meta tags basically mean

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: how HTML document is,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: it is told about it.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Keywords are added,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: descriptions are added.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Meta description is a very important keyword for SEO.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: That is, you can write about what this page is about.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: If you go to my website,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: then you will get to see here in view page source

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: that the meta description tag is attached.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: This is compressed HTML,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: so don't be confused by this.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: But here you can see that the meta description tag is attached,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: which describes this page.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: If we talk about Google,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: then Google shows the meta description here.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now I want to show you people

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: that what happens inside the doc type HTML head,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: that the page's meta tags, title tags, script tags,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: link tags are also there.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So now the script tag,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: you can put it just before the body,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: and you can put it above too.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: And what is the difference in this,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: But here you can see,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: I used link and added CSS again.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Then after this, the body is the main content of the website,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: which you can see on this page.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So what you will see on this page,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Okay?

chunks.text: And whatever script you put,

chunks.text: it will be executed.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Now by putting a script here,

chunks.text: and by putting a script in the head,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: But this is a basic structure of the HTML website.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: Lang is equal to en is an attribute.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: This is inside any tag,

chunks.text: Lang is equal to en,

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: so Lang is an attribute whose value is en.

chunks.title: Basic Structure of an HTML Website ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #3
chunks.text: So these key value pairs are used,

chunks.text: which tell about this tag.

chunks.text: Like in the meta tag,
